title: Microwave Mocha Mug Cake Recipe
full_text:
Microwave Mocha Mug Cake Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
10 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
tablespoon
unsalted butter
, softened, plus extra for greasing mug
3
tablespoons
brown sugar
3
tablespoons
all purpose flour
2
tablespoons
cocoa
1
teaspoon
instant
coffee granules
Pinch
salt
Pinch
baking soda
5
tablespoons
water
1/4
teaspoon
vanilla extract
2
tablespoons
bittersweet chocolate
chips (or
1
ounce
chopped)
Ice cream
or whipped cream to serve on top
Directions
Butter inside of a mug. Add 1 tablespoon butter, brown sugar, flour, cocoa, instant coffee, salt, baking soda, water, vanilla, and chips to the mug. Stir until completely combined.
Wipe inside rim of cup to remove excess batter. Microwave on High power until cake has risen and looks moist (not wet) on top, checking every 30 seconds, about 1 to 2 minutes. Avoid overcooking or it will be dry. Let rest to cool briefly before topping with ice cream and eating.
Special equipment
microwave safe mug
Cakes
Baking
Chocolate
